Awesome movie . Storyline direction is too good. Actors acting is superb speciallys Anupam Khers and Manoj bajpayee . They have given absolutely true message that 99 percent people are earning in black money example industrialist , politicans, film stars, police officers, prime minister's  ,.  President's etc. They are not proper tax payers. That's why they are leading luxurious life style  and getting protection from police and we public's are doing worship of them. They are hiding their money in house walls so that no one can notice that they have lots of money. These movie is based on real life incident

So good!!  I never see such excellent acting as in Indian movies. The stars move like clockwork.  Of course that is due mainly to direction and choreography, but what a team!  With the exception of one that did not appeal to my taste, the eight I have seen have just about worn my brain out.  I'm a big fan of thrillers and mysteries and Special 26 doesn't disappoint. Bravo!!!

Great movie... Now a days few movies are like this great... 
And MOST of the BOLLYWOOD movies are Just GARBAGES (Contain masala, songs, romance and family drama), it's better to watch TV serials... !!!!!
That's why nowadays i watch only very few selected good movies... like of Manoj Bajphayee, Irfhan khan, Nawazuddin siddique etc.

This is movie is seriously extraordinary and really very smart one!!!! I never got a second to get bored while watching it as its thrilling story totally conquered me!!! The acting performances are also remarkable specially manoj bajpayee's
Extraordinary movie which keeps us glued to the screen. Excellent screenplay. Till the climax we cannot guess what is going to happen. We'll made film by gathering the true incidents.

A man who have a keen interest to join the RAW agency. But after giving so many interviews he was not successful. So he made a team and with this team he loot to a huge gold shop and most other crowded and famous places by informing intelligence before stealing.
This film was the best thriller in 2013 and a hit which crossed 100cr. Mark . The film got great mix of thrill , comedy, action and interest akshay and anupam kher top performers in the movie
